title: Bet Result Schema for Dice Gambling Game
description: Schema for validating bet result responses from the dice gambling game server

dice_result.description: The result of the dice roll (1-6)

total_winnings.description: Total winnings from all bets in the round

new_balance.description: User's balance after winnings are applied

updated_jackpot.description: Updated jackpot pool amount after the round

round_id.description: UUID of the completed game round

dice_face.description: Dice face that was bet on

payout.description: Payout amount for this bet (0 if lost)

bet_results.description: Results for individual bets in the round
